products.title: Bella Blackout Mushroom Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Product id: sdb-vtb1383 fabric colour: mushroom brown material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes bella blackout mushroom brown 89mm vertical blind in brown.

products.title: Bella Putty Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured blackout fabric available in a range of colours. Dim out options available in the splash range. Bella putty vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Bella Beige (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
